titleInfo.title: Bordeaux Drive-In Theaters... Go Naked in the World

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue on split fountain, yellow to blue) announcing Bordeaux Drive-In film schedule for May 14-20. Events include "Go Naked in the World" starring Gina Lolobrigida, Anthony Franciosa, and Ernest Borgnine; "A Fever in the Blood" starring Efrem Zimbalist Jr. and Angie Dickinson; "Elephant Walk" starring Elizabeth Taylor, Dana Andrews, and Peter Finch; and "The Naked Jungle" starring Charlton Heston.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
